item.title: ETEA Test 2025: Complete Preparation Plan for PST & CT Teachers
item.description:
ETEA Test 2025: Complete Preparation Plan for PST & CT Teachers

For thousands of aspiring educators across Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, securing a government teaching position is more than just a jobâ€”it’s a promise of stability, respect, and a chance to shape the future. The gateway to this career is the highly competitive test conducted by the Educational Testing and Evaluation Agency (ETEA). As the announcement for Primary School Teacher (PST) and Certified Teacher (CT) positions looms for 2025, the question on every candidate’s mind is: “How do I prepare effectively?” Simply memorizing facts won’t cut it. Success requires a strategic, disciplined approach. This guide provides a complete, step-by-step preparation plan for the ETEA Teacher Recruitment process, designed to turn your ambition into achievement. Whether you’re a fresh graduate or have been trying for a few years, this is the roadmap you need to conquer the 2025 ETEA test.
